revision.text:
'''[[Eric S. Raymond]]''' (born 1957) is an American computer programmer and author.
'''Eric Raymond''' may also refer to:
* [[Eric Scott Raymond]] (born 1956), American flight instructor and glider pilot * [[Eric Raymond (Jem)|Eric Raymond (''Jem'')]], a fictional character in the 1980s cartoon television show ''Jem''
{{hndis|Raymond, Eric}}
